name: Airplane Appliqued Burp Cloth
description:
This burp cloth has an appliqued airplane centered above a name or monogram.

Please choose the type of fabric you would like from the drop down menu. If you would like a different color or pattern, please include a message when you check out using Paypal.

These burp cloths are made with 100% cotton by Gerber. I only use the 6-ply cloth diapers. As a mom of 3 former chronic spitters and reflux babies, they are the most absorbant. The burp cloths measure 14" x 20".

**If by any chance you'd like a different color scheme, please mention it in the comments section when you checkout through Paypal or you may email me at sewcurlycreations@gmail.com. If there are no additional instructions about change of colors, the colors of your burp cloth will replicate the picture listed.

The burp cloths wash extremely well. Please wash them in cold water and dry them on low heat.

name: Crayon Roll
description:
This crayon roll up holds 8 crayons in their own pocket.  They can easily rolled up by your child and secured with the elastic band.  

The crayon roll up can come personalized at no charge.  Personalizing the crayon roll makes it easy for children to see which roll is theirs.

In the comments section of Paypal, I need to know:  
The color you'd like for the inside 
The color you'd like for the outside
The name or initial you'd like embroidered

The colors available are purple, light blue, dark blue, green, red, pink, or orange.

In an effort to keep the price of the product and shipping lower, this item does NOT include the crayons.

name: Children's No-Tie Apron
description:
Somehow my kids never want to help me in the kitchen until my hands are already dirty (usually with chicken) and I am unable to tie an apron on them.  

These aprons were the answer to my prayers!  They are no-tie which means that the apron slips over the child's head just like a shirt.  It's easy for them to get on for themselves so they are ready to paint, cook, or dig in the garden.  

Toss them into the washing machine when they get dirty.  Wash them in cold water and dry them on low heat.

They come in 4 different fabric choices and include embroidery - your choice of a letter initial or name, which will be placed in the chest area.

Size SMALL is for children 2-4 years old and MEDIUM is for children 4-7 years old.

Please select your size and fabric print in the drop down box below.  In the comments section in Paypal during checkout, please specify what you would like embroidered.  If you leave that section blank, your apron will be sent without being embroidered.

The fabric choices are:
1. Green with flowers with pink edging 
2. Green stripe with green edging
3. Red chevron with navy blue edging
4. Yellow sunflower with orange edging (the photo shows pink but that is incorrect!)

name: Personalized Pillowcase
description:
These personalized pillowcases are made with a soft flannel material that your child will love to snuggle into!  The edge of the pillow has a contrasting fabric that allows your child's name to be showcased.  

These are great to use on a regular basis or for a sleepover so your child doesn't lose his or her pillow.

If you'd like another fabric or design, please send me a message.  I LOVE doing custom work and it's no additional charge.

The pillowcase measures 31" x 17" and fit a standard sized pillow.  They do NOT fit a very fluffy/ feathery pillow, however.

name: Tiny Bag
description:
These eco-friendly bags are made of 100% cotton material.  All the bags have a fabric tag on them.  I like the tag because it allows the bag to be attached to a car seat or stroller strap.  It also makes it easier to pull the bag out your diaper bag or purse.  Each bag comes with a velcro closure.  It makes it super easy for little hands to open and close all by themselves.  It's also strong enough to keep everything inside.  

The Tiny Bag is 4.5" x 3".  I originally created it to hold our season pass to the local amusement part and $5.  I attached it to the stroller and it was all I needed.  Now I use mine as a wallet that I toss into my diaper bag.  It's big enough to hold my driver's license, credit card, medical card, grocery store discount card, and cash.  I could add more to it but it's my simple wallet.  My mom recently asked me to make her one to hold all her store discount cards.

All the bags can be embroidered with a name or an initial.  Please add the embroidery to your cart as well, and let me know in the comments during Paypal's checkout what you would like written on it.  Embroidery is usually done on the fabric on the left side.  I've chosen that print specifically so that the embroidery is most visible on the pattern. 

The bags are machine washable.  Please wash them in cold water and dry them on low heat.

name: Snack Bag
description:
These eco-friendly bags are made of 100% cotton material.  All the bags have a fabric tag on them.  I like the tag because it allows the bag to be attached to a car seat or stroller strap.  It also makes it easier to pull the bag out your diaper bag or purse.  Each bag comes with a velcro closure.  It makes it super easy for little hands to open and close all by themselves.  It's also strong enough to keep everything inside.  

The Snack Bag is my girls' favorite.  It is 5" x 4.5".  It holds their snacks (cheerios, goldfish crackers) and even lunch (cheese,  veggies, even chicken nuggets & french fries).  Some children use them to hold crayons, Polly Pocket dolls, and trading cards.  The uses are endless. 

All the bags can be embroidered with a name or an initial.  Please add the embroidery to your cart as well, and let me know in the comments during Paypal's checkout what you would like written on it.  Embroidery is usually done on the fabric on the left side.  I've chosen that print specifically so that the embroidery is most visible on the pattern. 

The bags are machine washable.  Please wash them in cold water and dry them on low heat.

name: Snack Bags - set of 8
description:
Snack bags make the perfect birthday party favor.  Give your guests a resusable snack bag.  It will be the one birthday party favor they hold on to!  You can give it empty or fill it with small snacks or a box of crayons.  They are sold in a set of 8 at a 20% discount.  

This listing is for a pack of 8 snack bags and includes personalization.  You can choose from 2 different fabrics.  If you need additional snack bags, they can be ordered at a reduced rate of $5 per bag.

These eco-friendly bags are made of 100% cotton material.  All the bags have a fabric tag on them.  I like the tag because it allows the bag to be attached to a car seat or stroller strap.  It also makes it easier to pull the bag out your diaper bag or purse.  Each bag comes with a velcro closure.  It makes it super easy for little hands to open and close all by themselves.  It's also strong enough to keep everything inside.  

The Snack Bag is my girls' favorite.  It is 5" x 4.5".  It holds their snacks (cheerios, goldfish crackers) and even lunch (cheese,  veggies, even chicken nuggets & french fries).  Some children use them to hold crayons, Polly Pocket dolls, and trading cards.  The uses are endless. 

All the bags can be embroidered with a name or an initial.  Let me know in the comments during Paypal's checkout what names you would like embroidered on the bags.  Embroidery is usually done on the fabric on the left side.  I've chosen that print specifically so that the embroidery is most visible on the pattern. 

The bags are machine washable.  Please wash them in cold water and dry them on low heat.

name: Personalized Pillowcases - set of 8
description:
These personalized pillowcases are perfect birthday party favors, especially for a sleep over party!  They are sold in a set of 8 at a 20% off discount.

They are made with a soft flannel material that your child will love to snuggle into!  The edge of the pillow has a contrasting fabric that allows your child's name to be showcased.

name: Chalk cloth Placemats
description:
Chalk cloth placemats are perfect for everyone in your family!  They are a great way to entertain your children, especially, while you are cooking or while waiting when you are out to eat.  They can also be used while driving in the car, waiting in the doctor's office, or anywhere else.  

Have your child use a piece of chalk to draw, create, and play games on the chalk cloth side.  Then when they are finished, they can flip the placemat over and are ready to eat.  

This placemat easily rolls up to fit into a purse or a diaper bag and measures 11x15.  I didn't want to make it any bigger so it wouldn't take up too much space on the table.  As you can see from one of the pictures, it easily fits a full size plate, silverware, and a cup.  The placemat includes a pocket to store chalk between uses.

The chalk cloth can be wiped off with a wet paper towel so children can start creating and playing all over again.  The oil cloth side can be easily wiped off in between meals and snacks.

name: Appliqu√©d name onesie or shirt
description:
These personalized onesies and shirts come in your choice of designer fabric. If you are interested in a different color scheme or pattern, please let me know - I have a ton of fabric available and not enough room for the photos!

The letters for the name are all hand cut by me, adhered to the shirt, and then hand-stitched to ensure they are securely attached. Names will come in all lower case letters, unless you specify otherwise.

Right now, all onesies and shirts are short sleeves. If you are interested in long sleeves, please let me know - I have them available.

Onesie sizes available:
preemie, newborn, 3m, 6m, 9m, 12m, 18m, 24m
All onesies are Carter's brand.

T-shirt sizes available: 
12m, 2t, 3t, 4t, 5, 6, 7,

name: Add embroidery to a tiny bag, snack bag, or sandwich bag
description:
Please add this if you would like your bag (tiny, snack, or sandwich) to be embroidered.  

Make sure the quantity of embroidery reflects the amount of bags you want embroidered.  

**Write the name or initial you would like embroidered in the comments section when you check out through Paypal.**

Snuggle Squares can not be embroidered for safety purposes.  Burp cloths already include embroidery.

name: Circle Initial Embroidered Burp Cloth
description:
Personalized with a blue initial inside an orange polka dotted circle, this burp cloth makes the perfect baby gift.  Up to three initials can comfortaby fit within the circle.  A blue polka dotted grossgrain ribbon lines the bottom.

These burp cloths are made with 100% cotton by Gerber.  I only use the 6-ply cloth diapers.  As a mom of 3 former chronic spitters and reflux babies, they are the most absorbant.   The burp cloths measure 14" x 20".
